reviews.review: Jogo muito bom para jogar com amigos, muito divertido, dÃ¡ um cagaÃ§o da porra.. recomendo!
The game is like a mosquito. You hate to have it around, buzzing and annoying you at it's imperfect ways. However, when you get to smack that bicc, it all makes it worthwhile. Maybe.

ĞÑ‡ĞµĞ½ÑŒ Ñ…Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾ÑˆĞ°Ñ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° Ğ±ĞµĞ· Ğ±Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ¸ Ğ²ÑÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾

Pros:

1. Constant Chapters(Every 3 months) and updates,
2. It is probably the least repetitive multiplayer game. A lot of things (such as tile spawns, certain windows being open or not etc.) rng based. Also has a lot of maps.
3. There is a lot options to play. Killer, solo survivor, swf and custom match with your friends.
4. New cosmetics.
5. Every killer and survivors (except the licensed killers and survivors) can be obtianed by just playing the game, so you don't actually need to spend any money other than the base game. Also most of the cosmetics for original killers and survivors are available with in game time.
6. Every week there is up to 4 perks can be obtained through the Shrine if you don't have the killer and survivor.
7. New tomes and new lores every 3 months. The battlepass might be boring (because of charms, stop giving charms), but it is new content at the end.

Cons:

1. Bug city after big updates. Fix for bugs sometimes take a lot of time.
2. Very grindy.
3. This is not an actual con, but people might be toxic like in any other multiplayer game.
4. Sometimes there is unexplainable changes to the game, like you can question devs. Thinking what the hell are they doing? Why are they changing certain things, when it was fine as it is etc.
5. Lost a huge license. Worrysome for the future.
6. Although I don't care, the NFT topic hurt the game.
7. Multiple challenges cannot be completed at once which absolutely sucks. Like any other game that has battlepass allow you to complete multiple at once. But DbD don't. Naturally people who work, and have barely any time to play will eventually feel like only playing the game for the sake of completing the challenges. Not all of us are lifeless streamers who can play 8-10 hours every day.

There is also MMR in DbD right now, which I still don't know if it's good or bad.

Overall it is a good game. 7,5/10
With a combined of 4k hours in two accounts, i can safely say this is the most trash game i've played in years
Who dont like toxic Games :D Batter with Friends
Un juego muy divertido pero te recomiendo jugarlo con amigos

Gonna play killer? Hope you're ready to be tea-bagged at every window and blinded everytime you pick someone up, then flamed for camping even though you never hooked someone. Not your style? Try survivor! An exciting round of the killer finding you within 3 femtoseconds and hooking you to face camp you until dead while your team runs in circles doing jack shit. 10/10 would recomend.

I understand now why this game has the horror - survival tag.

Basically the killers are afraid of the survivors and they try to survive to not press the magical uninstall button or the definitive delete the game button in the steam support section.
